questions_and_notes: cell_methods should probably include "area: mean where sea".  On some native grids it might represent a point value so "mean" would be wrong.  But what about data that has been regridded?  Note that decadal stresses include "where sea"
long_name: Sea Water Surface Downward Y Stress
comment: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.
